languages.text: Пылающий всеми цветами, искаженный небесный диск подрагивает за бесконечными окнами капитанского мостика, когда корабль Вольного Торговца приближается к его чреву. Потусторонний голос, обволакивающий и холодный, проникает в ваш разум — что этот никчемный может предложить Королю?

traits.locale_text: Пылающий всеми цветами, искаженный небесный диск подрагивает за бесконечными окнами капитанского мостика, когда корабль Вольного Торговца приближается к его чреву. Потусторонний голос, обволакивающий и холодный, проникает в ваш разум — что этот никчемный может предложить Королю?

languages.text: Aflame with a plethora of colours, the distorted celestial disc trembles slightly beyond the endless windows on the captain's bridge as the Rogue Trader's ship approaches its centre. An otherworldly voice, cold and enveloping, enters your mind. What could this puny wretch possibly offer a King?
languages.original_text: Пылающий всеми цветами, искаженный небесный диск подрагивает за бесконечными окнами капитанского мостика, когда корабль Вольного Торговца приближается к его чреву. Потусторонний голос, обволакивающий и холодный, проникает в ваш разум — что этот никчемный может предложить Королю?

traits.locale_text: Aflame with a plethora of colours, a distorted celestial disc is twitching slightly behind the endless row of windows on the captain's bridge as the Rogue Trader's ship approaches its centre. An otherworldly voice, cold, enveloping, enters your mind. What could this puny wretch possibly offer the King?

Aflame with a plethora of colours, a distorted celestial disc is twitching slightly behind the endless row of windows on the captain's bridge as the Rogue Trader's ship approaches its centre. An otherworldly voice, cold, enveloping, enters your mind. What could this puny wretch possibly offer the King?

Aflame with a plethora of colours, a distorted celestial disc twitches slightly behind the endless row of windows on the captain's bridge, the Rogue Trader's ship approaching its centre. An otherworldly voice, cold, enveloping, enters your mind. What could this puny wretch possibly offer a King?

Aflame with a plethora of colours, the distorted celestial disc trembles slightly beyond the endless windows on the captain's bridge as the Rogue Trader's ship approaches its centre. An otherworldly voice, cold and enveloping, enters your mind. What could this puny wretch possibly offer a King?

Aflame with a plethora of colours, the distorted celestial disc trembles slightly beyond the endless windows on the captain's bridge as the Rogue Trader's ship approaches its centre. An otherworldly voice, cold and enveloping, enters your mind. What could this puny wretch possibly offer a King?

Aflame with a plethora of colours, the distorted celestial disc trembles slightly beyond the endless windows on the captain's bridge as the Rogue Trader's ship approaches its centre. An otherworldly voice, cold and enveloping, enters your mind. What could this puny wretch possibly offer a King?

languages.text: 当行商浪人的舰船接近奇点中心时，扭曲的圆盘型天体在舰桥窗外微微颤抖，迸发出了无穷无尽的色彩。某个不属于这个世界的冰冷声音，将你的整个意识覆盖其中。“如此孱弱的可怜虫，又能给国王带来什么呢？”
languages.original_text: Aflame with a plethora of colours, the distorted celestial disc trembles slightly beyond the endless windows on the captain's bridge as the Rogue Trader's ship approaches its centre. An otherworldly voice, cold and enveloping, enters your mind. What could this puny wretch possibly offer a King?

traits.locale_text: 当行商浪人的舰船接近奇点中心时，扭曲的圆盘型天体在舰桥窗外微微颤抖，迸发出了无穷无尽的色彩。某个不属于这个世界的冰冷声音，将你的整个意识覆盖其中。“如此孱弱的可怜虫，又能给国王带来什么呢？”

languages.text: Ardiendo con una miríada de colores, el disco celestial distorsionado se estremece ligeramente al otro lado de las interminables ventanas del puente del capitán mientras la nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente se aproxima a su centro. Una voz sobrenatural, fría y envolvente, se introduce en tu mente. ¿Qué puede ofrecerle est{mf|e|a} miserable desdichad{mf|o|a} al rey?
languages.original_text: Aflame with a plethora of colours, the distorted celestial disc trembles slightly beyond the endless windows on the captain's bridge as the Rogue Trader's ship approaches its centre. An otherworldly voice, cold and enveloping, enters your mind. What could this puny wretch possibly offer a King?

traits.locale_text: Ardiendo con una miríada de colores, el disco celestial distorsionado se estremece ligeramente al otro lado de las interminables ventanas del puente del capitán mientras la nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente se aproxima a su centro. Una voz sobrenatural, fría y envolvente, se introduce en tu mente. ¿Qué puede ofrecerle est{mf|e|a} miserable desdichad{mf|o|a} al rey?

languages.text: ローグ・トレーダーの船がその中心に近づいてみると、艦橋の無数の窓のわずかに向こう側で歪んだ天盤が震え、色とりどりの炎が燃え上がっている。冷たく包み込むような異世界の声が心に入り込んでくる。こんなちっぽけな人間が、王に何を捧げられるというのだ？
languages.original_text: Aflame with a plethora of colours, the distorted celestial disc trembles slightly beyond the endless windows on the captain's bridge as the Rogue Trader's ship approaches its centre. An otherworldly voice, cold and enveloping, enters your mind. What could this puny wretch possibly offer a King?

traits.locale_text: ローグ・トレーダーの船がその中心に近づいてみると、艦橋の無数の窓のわずかに向こう側で歪んだ天盤が震え、色とりどりの炎が燃え上がっている。冷たく包み込むような異世界の声が心に入り込んでくる。こんなちっぽけな人間が、王に何を捧げられるというのだ？

languages.text: Vor den endlosen Fenstern der Brücke zittert die verzerrte Himmelsscheibe in unzähligen Farben, als das Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} auf ihr Zentrum zufliegt. Eine andersweltliche Stimme dringt in deinen Verstand ein, kalt und alles umschließend. Was könnte dieser erbärmliche Wurm einem König jemals anzubieten haben?
languages.original_text: Aflame with a plethora of colours, the distorted celestial disc trembles slightly beyond the endless windows on the captain's bridge as the Rogue Trader's ship approaches its centre. An otherworldly voice, cold and enveloping, enters your mind. What could this puny wretch possibly offer a King?

traits.locale_text: Vor den endlosen Fenstern der Brücke zittert die verzerrte Himmelsscheibe in unzähligen Farben, als das Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} auf ihr Zentrum zufliegt. Eine andersweltliche Stimme dringt in deinen Verstand ein, kalt und alles umschließend. Was könnte dieser erbärmliche Wurm einem König jemals anzubieten haben?

languages.text: Auréolé de nombreuses couleurs, le disque céleste distordu semble trembler légèrement à travers les gigantesques fenêtres de la passerelle de commandement, alors que le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} approche de son centre. Une voix venue d'un autre monde, froide et envoûtante, pénètre votre esprit. Qu'est-ce qu'un misérable insecte comme vous pourrait bien offrir à un Roi ?
languages.original_text: Aflame with a plethora of colours, the distorted celestial disc trembles slightly beyond the endless windows on the captain's bridge as the Rogue Trader's ship approaches its centre. An otherworldly voice, cold and enveloping, enters your mind. What could this puny wretch possibly offer a King?

traits.locale_text: Auréolé de nombreuses couleurs, le disque céleste distordu semble trembler légèrement à travers les gigantesques fenêtres de la passerelle de commandement, alors que le vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} approche de son centre. Une voix venue d'un autre monde, froide et envoûtante, pénètre votre esprit. Qu'est-ce qu'un misérable insecte comme vous pourrait bien offrir à un Roi ?

languages.text: Sayısız rengin dansıyla alev alev yanan bozulmuş göksel disk, kaptan köprüsündeki sonsuz camların ötesinde hafifçe titrerken Hür Tacir'in gemisi de merkezine yaklaşıyor. Soğuk ve içine işleyen başka bir dünyaya ait bir ses, zihinlere doluyor. Bu zavallıcık, bir Kral'a ne sunabilir ki?
languages.original_text: Aflame with a plethora of colours, the distorted celestial disc trembles slightly beyond the endless windows on the captain's bridge as the Rogue Trader's ship approaches its centre. An otherworldly voice, cold and enveloping, enters your mind. What could this puny wretch possibly offer a King?
